commodities.tests.technical
Class StochasticKDExponentialTest

java.lang.Object
  commodities.tests.technical.TechnicalTestAbstract
      commodities.tests.technical.StochasticKDExponentialTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
TechnicalTestInterface
public class StochasticKDExponentialTest
extends TechnicalTestAbstract

The StochasticKDExponentialTest performs the stochastic oscillator test where the oscillator (%K) is compared to a exponential moving average (%D) of the oscillator. When %K crosses %D, a buy/sell signal is produced.

Version:
1.0
Author:
J.R. Titko
Updated:
2004.11.16

optimizeTest

public void optimizeTest()
Optimize this test to determine the most profitable combination of parameters that should be used. This does not mean the test will produce a positive profitability, but simply the most profitable (least loss).

Specified by:
optimizeTest in interface TechnicalTestInterface
Specified by:
optimizeTest in class TechnicalTestAbstract
